name: Timezone_Generic
keywords: timing, device, control, rtc, wifi, ethernet
description: Library to facilitate time zone conversions and automatic daylight saving (summer) time adjustments. For ESP8266, ESP32, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, Teensy, SAM DUE, etc. using W5x00/ENC28J60/LAN8742A Ethernet, ESP or ESP-AT WiFi or WiFiNINA
